sentences.sContent: If you need more information, you might try the Internet.
sentences.sCn: 如果你需要更多的信息，可以试试因特网。

sentences.sContent: I thought we might go to the new Chinese restaurant on the High Street.
sentences.sCn: 我想我们可以到大街上新开的那家中国餐馆去。

sentences.sContent: It might be a good idea to put those plants in the shade.
sentences.sCn: 把那些植物放在阴凉处也许是个好主意。

sentences.sContent: We’re going to a concert. You might like to come with us.
sentences.sCn: 我们要去听音乐会，你也许想和我们一起去吧。

phrases.pCn: 倒不如；满可以；还是…好；最好还是
无稽之谈；奇迹可能会发生

words.tran: 有力的；强有力的；有势力的

trans.tranCn: 可以〔用于礼貌地提出建议〕
trans.tranOther: used to suggest politely what someone should do
